messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2391
messages.msgSnippet: **And read John Holt s Never too Late about him teaching himself violin.** cello  :)  And it s not about teaching himself - he hired teachers at every step,
messages.messageBody:
**And read John Holt's "Never too Late" about him teaching himself violin.**

cello :) And it's not about teaching himself - he hired teachers at every
step, it's about the process of learning to play an instrument at an
"advanced age" just for the joy of it, about the learner being in charge of
the learning, about choosing teachers who support the vision of the learner
instead of imposing their own, about the idea of making music instead of
practicing.

Deborah in IL
